author: PTI
title: Marvel film star Evangeline Lilly apologises for insensitive comments on coronavirus fear
description: ‘Ant-Man and the Wasp’ star was severely criticised on social media by many, including Sophie Turner and Maggie Grace
content:
Ant-Man and the Wasp actor Evangeline Lilly has tendered an apology over her dismissive and arrogant statement about social distancing in the wake of coronavirus pandemic.
The Marvel film star was severely criticised on social by many, including Game of Thro… [+2147 chars]
